products.title: Hive Blackout Black Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout black perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

Made to measure from 37.

products.title: Genesis Blackout Black Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis blackout range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This black perfect fit roller blind is effortlessly stylish and is also made from blackout fabric so will help to keep the light out of rooms when you want to keep them dark. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws.

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black perfect fit roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout perfect fit roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first.

products.title: Shimmer Blackout Quartz Black Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: A luxurious, metallic finish fabric. Available in 6 stunning shades suitable for an array of different interior styles. We love this incredibly versitile black out fabric.
